LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Alert_Explanation: 文图拉抽出的均衡象位会影响随后<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Sthri: <color=#9B33F0>Sthri:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁最终袭击点数x0.9，大型袭击点数不会超过8500点
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_V0Rei: <color=#9B33F0>V0Rei:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁将会着重考虑人口
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Helmi: <color=#9B33F0>Helmi:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁将会完全按照Helmi的风格，对最终袭击点数乘以[0.7~1.3]之间的随机值
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Ventura:
<color=#9B33F0>Ventura:
</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁中，将当前累计科研点数纳入到最终袭击点数计算中。设原始袭击点数为<color=#9B33F0>p</color>，科研点数为<color=#9B33F0>r</color>，通过科研点数计算袭击点数增幅的函数为<color=#9B33F0>g(x)</color>

则：<color=#9B33F0>f(x)=(p*0.7+g(r))*1.2</color>

其中，<color=#9B33F0>g(x)</color>计算所得的最终值小于等于<color=#9B33F0>r*0.5</color>。同时，该象位持续期间科研速度常驻x1.5
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_REBOOT: <color=#9B33F0>REBOOT:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁中，每次威胁都有50%的几率被替换成“必须接受的可选项”
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Loya: <color=#9B33F0>Loya:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁中，每次大型威胁都将伴随一个相对削弱的另一个大型威胁一起出现
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Loya_Unlock: <color=#9B33F0>Loya:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁将会表现得完全正常
LanguageData.REBOOT_Ventura_Symbols_Normal: <color=#9B33F0>Normal:\n</color>接下来的<color=#EE0000>{0}</color>次大型威胁将会表现得完全正常
